entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 9.0.200 breaks "dotnet workload restore ..\some.sln" #47390

Closed

  • Default `--interactive` to `true` across the commands #35165
    10.0.1xx
  • MAUI Apps cannot be restored in locked mode. #41317
    10.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove interactive special case #47389
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47388
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up extensions for dotnet CLI & Utils #47373
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • [Github Actions] Remove Branch Lockdown Labels on Branding Merge #47371
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable --interactive by default for sessions that are local. #47226
    untriaged, Document for new feature, cli-ux
  • vs-solutionpersistence: 1.0.28 -> 1.0.52 #47328
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2658528 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run installer tests in pipeline #47313
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • make the workload resolver only light up for the specific entrypoint SDKs we control #41268
    untriaged, Area-SdkResolvers, DO NOT MERGE
  • Add workloads build #47225
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fixup sourcelink information #47363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove primary vertical concept from JoinVerticals #47338
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • NuGetPackageDownloader: Only verify signing on windows by default #47321
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
